item.title: ‘Driver’s Ed’ Review: Bobby Farrelly’s Tame Throwback Exhumes, But Can’t Revive, the ’90s Teen Comedy
item.description: Both an obvious product of ’90s nostalgia and the definitive cure for it, Bobby Farrelly’s terminally innocuous “Driver’s Ed” can be described as a youth comedy, but whose yout
